attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Road pricing is not the answer to  road congestion. The cost of setting up and running the scheme would be enormous and the cost of collection out of proportion to money raised. What would amount to surveillance of individuals nationally would be unacceptable and in my view contrary to the Human Rights legislation.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
